result.arabic_text: قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيۡرٌ أَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
result.translation: 59. Dheh: Ammaan idilkeed iyo mahad waxaa leh Allaah, nabadna ha ahaato addoomahiisa uu doortay dushooda. Ma Alle baa wanaagsan, mise kuwa (ilaahyada beenta ah) ay la wadaajiyaan cibaadada shariigyo ahaan?
